title: Custom Skins
body: Hi! Maybe I have posted this before (not very sure), but I was wondering if customs skins like the Pikachu Skin for Kennen is allowed. It doesn't give me an advantage to the game like a hack or anything. So I was wondering if it was allowed or not. I mean, I've seen many people use them so. (Kshaway!!!) Just wondering...

replies.body:
As *Wolfess* mentioned, we don't support third-party apps, so using them is always a gamble. The biggest concern is that unless you're very careful or reach out to the developer of the app, it's hard to ensure the app doesn't do other actions that can give you a competitive advantage. 

The FAQ they linked is a good read to understand out stance on third-party apps as a whole. Let me know if you have any questions.

using programs that add custom skins to the game is use-at-your-own-risk since you never know what exactly it's doing and if it will get picked up by their detection, however skins that do-not copy official skins are allowed, one that DO copy riot skins are not allowed.

you can read a bit more here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848
